[14 & 15 GEO. 5.] Law of Property Act (Postponement),DRAFT OF ABILL TO Postpone the coming into operation of the Law 4iD. 1924, of Property Act, 1922, until the first day of ' - January, nineteen hundred' and twenty-six. BE it enacted by the King's most Excellent Majesty, by and with the advice and consent of the Lords Spiritual and Temporal and Commons, in this present Parliament assembled, and by the authority of the same, 5 as follows: 1. The first day of January, nineteen hundred and Postpone- twenty-six, shall he substituted for the first day of ment of January, nineteen hundred and twenty-five, as the date commence- on which the Law of Property Act, 1922, is to come into ^Jf1^10 operation. - Geo. 5. c. 16. 2. This Act may be cited as the Law of Property Short title. Act (Postponement) Act, 1924.155-1 Law of Property Act (Postponement).
